content:
Hey! My PR Add str pointer methods was stuck waiting for review for quite a while now (since July). What can be the way forward?

I've summed up the state of the pr in this comment.

@Waffle Lapkin to make it easier to digest it may be worth splitting this PR into two parts, separating the non-controversial bits from the bits that have yet to be discussed. alternatively (or additionally) I would recommend asking the libs-api team to nominate it for discussion during their weekly meeting

bstrie said:

Waffle Lapkin alternatively (or additionally) I would recommend asking the libs-api team to nominate it for discussion during their weekly meeting

How can I do this?

There's a review capacity shortage and the backlog is long. Is something blocked on it or something else that would warrant prioritizing this over other PRs?
You could have rustbot label it with I-prioritize (I think I-nominated is not available to non-members) and say why it needs attention.
@The 8472 I'm not aware of anything that is blocked on this/any other reason why this should be prioritized. Thanks for explaining, I'll just wait :smile:
